hero.title: Welcome to InsightFlow
hero.subtitle: The best platform for AI-powered data analysis
hero.description: Turn your data into valuable insights with our advanced artificial intelligence technology.

features_subtitle: Everything you need for professional data analysis
features_ai_description: Machine learning algorithms for predictive analysis and automated insights.
features_simple_description: Drag-and-drop interface to create custom dashboards in minutes.
features_realtime_description: Real-time monitoring so you never miss an important update.

dashboard.title: Intuitive Dashboard
dashboard.description: Clean and easy-to-use interface to visualize all your data.

realtime.title: Real Time
realtime.description: Instant updates and real-time monitoring of your data.

security.title: Advanced Security
security.description: Enterprise-level data protection with end-to-end encryption.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of companies already using InsightFlow

footer_description: We democratize data analysis with the power of AI, making insights accessible to all businesses.
whyPlatform_title: Your data is your greatest competitive advantage.
whyPlatform_description: Over 80% of SMEs have valuable data they do not use. Complex tools and the cost of specialists are barriers that InsightFlow eliminates, making data intelligence accessible to everyone.
solution_description: Our visual and AI-guided interface accompanies you every step, from upload to dashboard. You don't need to be a data scientist or know how to code.
agent_subtitle: The team of AI superheroes is ready to turn your data into knowledge with their unique powers.
cta_description: Join thousands of companies that have already discovered the power of smart insights.
plans_description: Choose the ideal plan for you.
plans_free_description: Basic access to start exploring the platform.
plans_premium_description: Advanced features for professionals and small businesses.
plans_diamond_description: Full access to the complete agent team for large companies.
about_subtitle: Our mission is to democratize data analysis
about_description: At InsightFlow, our vision is to turn the information age into an era of smart, actionable decisions. The platform was created to break the cycle of forgotten data in SMEs, offering a powerful and accessible tool for everyone, regardless of their experience level.
about_team_description: We are passionate about data, innovation, and helping companies grow through intelligent insights.
about_pillar_transparency_desc: Every action and analysis result is recorded and can be reviewed, ensuring total trust in the generated insights.
about_pillar_assistance_desc: Our AI suggests the best analytical paths, but the final control always remains in your hands.
about_pillar_flexibility_desc: Allows you to customize the analytical journey according to your specific needs.
about_pillar_reproducibility_desc: Analyses can be easily repeated and results exported for reports and presentations.
about_technology: Our technology is based on a modular analytical pipeline that intuitively guides the user from data ingestion to result interpretation. We believe that access to data science should not be a privilege, but a tool for the growth of any business.
